snippet: Android users are clearly hungry for Instagram, the mobile photo-sharing app. The company behind Instagram released a version of its application for owners of Android devices, and they have been signing up at a rate of more than 2,000 people a...
abstract: Android users are clearly hungry for Instagram, the mobile photo-sharing app. The company behind Instagram released a version of its application for owners of Android devices, and they have been signing up at a rate of more than 2,000 people a minute, according to Kevin Systrom, the company's chief executive.

headline.main: Android Version of Instagram Gets 2,000 Signups a Minute
